thread.title: Microsoft says there are 110 million devices with Windows 10
thread.title_full: Microsoft says there are 110 million devices with Windows 10 | The Verge

author: Sean O'Kane
title: Microsoft says there are 110 million devices with Windows 10
text:
Windows 10 has been installed on more than 110 million devices since it was released on July 29th. That sounds like pretty good progress considering that Microsoft said it hoped to reach 1 billion devices " within two to three years " at the company's developer conference in April.
On top of that, Microsoft's Terry Myerson said that 650 billion web pages have been viewed on Edge, the company's newest browser, and users have streamed 120 years of gameplay from Xbox systems to Windows 10 devices.
The early engagement with Windows 10 doesn't stop there. Users have also already proven hungry for things to do with the new operating system, according to Myerson â€” there has been more than one billion visits to Windows app store from Windows 10 devices since the July launch. Cortana has been served with more than a billion queries from Windows 10 devices, too.
See all of the Microsoft news right here !
